Bitcoin co-opted one altcoin idea: The first issuance cut in 2012 was called "the halving." Dogecoin was created in 2013; its userbase memified the 2014 cut to "the halvening." Somehow it caught on and since Bitcoin's 2016 cut it has been "the halvening."
